commit message:
New theme colors

The old one didn't look too good in the running applications menu (the app
icon was almost invisible there).
Update IP address on Wi-Fi state change
Update app description and state root requirement
Show toasts when Wi-Fi connects or disconnects

Let user know if they are disconnected from Wi-Fi

Rather than show a all-zeroes IP address that makes no sense, tell them that
they are not connected to a Wi-Fi network at the moment.
